death-of-a-loved-one.title: Death of a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.summary: If you have lost a loved one you may qualify for help including assistance with burial or funeral costs financial support and more.
death-of-a-loved-one.secondaryHeadline: Government assistance after losing a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.eligibilityCriteria: Please check the boxes and select the options that best describe your situation. Answer as many questions as possible for the most accurate results.
About the military service of the person who died
About you (the person applying for benefits)
